title: Enable resident discharge and deletion (archive) actions from the Dashboard
constraints: Do not create new features that duplicate existing Dashboard discharge and archive resident actions (already implemented in frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx using useDischargeResident and useArchiveResident).
Use English for any user-facing text.

Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain single-actor with all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo; only introduce backend/migration.mo changes if a stable-state layout migration is required (conditional migration policy).
nonGoals: Adding a hard-delete resident operation (current design uses soft archive).
Adding any new authentication provider beyond Internet Identity.
